name: VOLUNTARY INSTITUTION FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF HEALTH AND YOUTH ACTIVITIES (VIDHYA)

address: Plot No.32 Door No.14 Gandhi Nagar

briefDescription: VIDHYAA established in the year 1993 working in the field of Environment, Protection, Conservation and Environment Education for the last 7 years in the districts of Thiruvallur, Kanchipuram and Vilupuram has got rich experience and expertise in the field.  We Planned, Implemented, Monitored various awareness programs, Camps, Training, Sensitization meetings, Tree planting awareness campaign on the themes of environment.VIDHYAA is registered as non-profit voluntary organization came into existence in 1993. It started with the motivation to help the poor and down trodden people of the society for their betterment of life, adult education, vocational training, health awareness programme, and self employment.
